biotools.summary: This tool identifies signature genes or genes that are unique to a taxonomic clade and thus useful in phylogenetic analysis. Users input a set of query sequences and returned is a list of taxonomic clades that share signatures with the query.

bioschemas.name: Signature
bioschemas.summary: This tool identifies signature genes or genes that are unique to a taxonomic clade and thus useful in phylogenetic analysis. Users input a set of query sequences and returned is a list of taxonomic clades that share signatures with the query.
